data.title: All My Children FanFiction Archive
data.meta_description: TV Shows: All My Children fanfiction archive with over 950 stories. Come in to read, write, review, and interact with other fans.
data.text:
Crossovers Communities Forums TV Shows All My Children

Filters

Pairing Plus Filters Pairing Without Filters

745 | Page 1 2 3 4 11 .. Last Next Â»

Amor Vincit Omnia by gpgurl50 reviews

An AU BAM Bianca and Maggie story, that tells the story of BAM being torn between their two families, the Kanes and Stones. There will be shout outs to a lot of other characters too.

Rated: T - English - Romance - Chapters: 17 - Words: 65,135 - Reviews: 10 - Favs: 9 - Follows: 8 - Updated: 7/26 - Published: 2/8/2009 - Bianca M., Erica K., Maggie S., Vanessa

If You Were Mine by samanthajax reviews

What if they were meant to be? Kendall/Aidan. Completely AU.

Rated: T - English - Angst/Drama - Chapters: 4 - Words: 1,412 - Reviews: 2 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 1 - Updated: 7/22 - Published: 7/16 - Kendall H.S., Aidan D.

Tears Of Yesterday by BoandNora-ItsOneWord

Bianca comes to Paris to check on Maggie and ends up rediscovering her love for her. BaM

Rated: T - English - Angst/Romance - Chapters: 6 - Words: 4,082 - Published: 7/17 - [Bianca M., Maggie S.]

Guilty Secrets by samanthajax reviews

Another take on what really happened after the AMC 1.0 cliffhanger! (Castfic!)

Rated: T - English - Drama/Tragedy - Chapters: 1 - Words: 915 - Reviews: 1 - Published: 7/16 - Bianca M., Zach S., JR C., OC

Every Other Friday by YH reviews

Two people meet up every other weekend.

Rated: K+ - English - Drama - Chapters: 1 - Words: 3,355 - Reviews: 1 - Published: 6/22

Old Wounds by samanthajax

Salt poured into old wounds that never fully healed. Or, in which Miranda's 18th birthday party sets the stage for more Pine Valley drama. (Cast fic!)

Rated: T - English - Angst/Hurt/Comfort - Chapters: 2 - Words: 2,937 - Published: 5/6 - Miranda M., Zach S., Ryan L., AJ/Adam Chandler III

Kegs & Eggs by luci465 reviews

This is an AU tale for Minx, and it's not related to "Things Change". It centers around Bianca and Marissa meeting on St. Patrick's Day and how their relationship progresses from there. Just some fluff that came to me.

Rated: T - English - Friendship/Romance - Chapters: 27 - Words: 107,316 - Reviews: 128 - Favs: 48 - Follows: 59 - Updated: 4/11 - Published: 3/17/2016 - [Bianca M., Marissa T.]

every time you hurt me, the less that I cry prompt collection by awitchywoman reviews

This is a collection of prompts that inspired me. Inside you'll find short stories that range from angst, AU, and fluff to NC-17. There's something for everyone here!

Rated: K - English - Romance/Drama - Chapters: 3 - Words: 2,692 - Reviews: 2 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 1 - Published: 2/13 - Erica K., David H.

Bianca and Maggie: Second chance by jediknigh5

Four years after Marissa's murder Bianca is certain she will never fall in love again. But then an old love returns. Could these two really have a second chance at love?

Rated: T - English - Romance - Chapters: 13 - Words: 5,058 - Favs: 2 - Follows: 2 - Updated: 6/18/2019 - Published: 6/11/2019 - Bianca M., Maggie S. - Complete

What Should Never Be by awitchywoman reviews

Following Marissa Tasker's death, Bianca Montgomery becomes ill. The relationships of Pine Valley are flipped upside down. Can Bianca survive? Can David Hayward and Erica Kane repair their relationship? Will they take it too far? Will Jack Mongtomery and Erica grow closer as they comfort each other? Will Jack find someone new? THIS FIC IS CURRENTLY ON HIATUS. STAY TUNED FOR UPDATES

Rated: T - English - Drama/Romance - Chapters: 4 - Words: 5,535 - Reviews: 1 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 4 - Updated: 5/13/2019 - Published: 1/11/2017 - Bianca M., Erica K., Jackson M., David H.

Without A Trace by awitchywoman reviews

Erica's disappearance flips Pine Valley and the life of a handsome cardiologist upside down. Characters: Erica Kane, David Hayward, Vanessa Bennett, Bianca Montgomery, Leo DuPree, Brooke English, Jackson Montgomery, etc.

Rated: T - English - Drama/Romance - Chapters: 5 - Words: 8,382 - Reviews: 5 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 1 - Updated: 5/13/2019 - Published: 12/9/2018 - Bianca M., Erica K., David H., Vanessa

Heaven Must Be Missing An Angel by kage girl reviews

this is what I think may have happened after Noah and Julia left Pine Valley

Rated: T - English - Romance - Chapters: 1 - Words: 2,671 - Reviews: 2 - Favs: 1 - Published: 5/2/2019 - Julia S., Noah K. - Complete

On her own by jediknigh5 reviews

Complete AU, I'm taking some of the characters we know and love/hate and taking them for a spin, in diffeent directions than you might think. Going to be a long one, but a lot of fun along the way. More than a little angst, but has a happy ending, eventually.

Rated: T - English - Hurt/Comfort/Family - Chapters: 728 - Words: 292,152 - Reviews: 15 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 1 - Updated: 3/15/2019 - Published: 4/13/2018 - Complete

Save Me by ThisIsHeavy reviews

Reese and Bianca fight to save their family Disclaimer: All My Children and the characters there in are the sole property of ABC and their creators. I take no ownership of this work and therefore permit its use for any reason by the afore mentioned owner

Rated: T - English - Drama/Mystery - Chapters: 11 - Words: 19,147 - Reviews: 15 - Favs: 10 - Follows: 15 - Updated: 1/28/2019 - Published: 2/11/2010 - Bianca M., Reese W.

Wonderwall by KylieCreations reviews

Set in Pine Valley July 2000. What if Dixie had never walked into the Valley Inn that day, and Erica hadn't added any conditions to her marrying David. Instead of walking in on them fighting, Bianca walks in on them celebrating. Reality quickly comes calling. (Events of the time will be the same ie: Bianca will still come out, Travis will still die, and Dimitri is still alive, etc)

Rated: T - English - Romance/Angst - Chapters: 5 - Words: 5,329 - Reviews: 3 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 1 - Updated: 1/8/2019 - Published: 12/10/2018 - Bianca M., Erica K., David H., Dimitri M.

Poison & Wine by KylieCreations reviews

Erica centric story picking up right after she learns that Bianca didn't have an abortion. Not quite AU, but I'm taking enough creative liberties that it might as well be.

Rated: T - English - Angst/Hurt/Comfort - Chapters: 12 - Words: 17,778 - Reviews: 3 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 1 - Updated: 1/7/2019 - Published: 12/30/2018 - Bianca M., Erica K., Jackson M., David H.

Santa Minx by luci465 reviews

This is another little peek into Minx Christmas future and stays within the "Things Change" universe. This was meant to be posted before Christmas, but I obviously didn't make that deadline. As for this story, it's basically a big ball of fluff surrounding the Tasker-Montgomery family.

Rated: T - English - Family/Romance - Chapters: 1 - Words: 6,737 - Reviews: 3 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 2 - Published: 1/6/2019 - [Bianca M., Marissa T.] - Complete

The Sweet Escape by angelsinstead

Reese and Bianca are making big decisions while relaxing at the beach.

Rated: T - English - Romance/Drama - Chapters: 1 - Words: 798 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 1 - Published: 7/5/2018 - Bianca M., Reese W. - Complete

When You Believe by angelsinstead reviews

A miracle happens when Bianca is reunited with her baby Miranda.

Rated: T - English - Drama/Hurt/Comfort - Chapters: 1 - Words: 328 - Reviews: 1 - Favs: 2 - Follows: 1 - Published: 6/16/2018 - Bianca M., Miranda M., Erica K. - Complete

Til It Happens to You by angelsinstead

Bianca's heart is broken when she loses her baby girl.

Rated: T - English - Drama/Tragedy - Chapters: 1 - Words: 561 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 1 - Published: 5/21/2018 - Bianca M., Miranda M., Kendall H.S. - Complete

I'm to in love to let it go by supercorpforever88 reviews

Maggie is about to marry Johnathon, can Bianca stop her in time?

Rated: T - English - Drama/Romance - Chapters: 2 - Words: 2,437 - Reviews: 5 - Favs: 4 - Follows: 6 - Updated: 3/23/2018 - Published: 12/12/2015 - Bianca M., Maggie S., Jonathan L.

Home for the Holidays by luci465 reviews

This is a one shot for the Tasker-Montgomery family and is centered around the Christmas and New Year's holidays, obviously. It's also another little glimpse into their future and takes place in the 'Things Change' universe. There is a reveal in here as to a question some of you have asked. It doesn't give you the whole story but does provide a little peek.

Rated: T - English - Family/Romance - Chapters: 1 - Words: 5,913 - Reviews: 9 - Favs: 4 - Follows: 5 - Published: 1/6/2018 - [Bianca M., Marissa T.] - Complete

Merchant island by jediknigh5

A murder mystery, based somewhat on "And then there were none." AU, set in January 2005. The suspects, in alphabetical order, are Bianca, David, Erica, Greenlee, Jackson, JR Kendall, Lena, Ryan, and Zack.

Rated: T - English - Mystery/Tragedy - Chapters: 36 - Words: 18,094 - Favs: 1 - Follows: 1 - Updated: 12/1/2017 - Published: 11/27/2017 - Complete

Sometimes We Just Need Each Other by drdavidfan reviews

With the end of the show near and Leo's return, I got to thinking of when he died. What if D&G were more than just friends? If only to get through the pain. Leo/Greenlee, David/Anna; Reviews encourage updates ;

Rated: T - English - Hurt/Comfort/Family - Chapters: 23 - Words: 26,166 - Reviews: 38 - Favs: 3 - Follows: 6 - Updated: 11/10/2017 - Published: 8/13/2011 - David H., Anna D., Greenlee S. D. L.

Bianca for president by jediknigh5 reviews

The title sums it up. My little way of dealing with my frustration over both major candidates this last election.

Rated: T - English - Drama - Chapters: 726 - Words: 204,189 - Reviews: 1 - Favs: 4 - Follows: 4 - Updated: 8/12/2017 - Published: 1/1/2017 - Bianca M., Miranda M., OC - Complete
